name: sweater scarf with sleeves
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials), in one printable file without advertisements. 

crochet sweater scarf, scarf with sleeves, wrap sweater, or even a thneed...... no matter what you call it, this highly versatile scarf sweater is an easy, beginner friendly crochet pattern that's worked all in one piece and can be styled and worn several different ways!

[purchase the crochet sweater scarf kit!][2] (aff): lion brand has a full kit of the sweater scarf with sleeves, available on their website. the crochet kit includes your choice of colors and a digital copy of the crochet pattern.

**sizing**
the pattern is written for women’s sizes xs/s/m, l/xl/2x, 3x/4x/5x.

**yarn**
the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand wool ease 80% acrylic / 20% wool (197 yds / 180 m
/ 85 g / 3 oz). other heavy worsted weight yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met.

crochet sweater scarf with sleeves design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.
